answers.answer: My first was breech until almost 37 weeks. As soon as he turned my water broke. He was only 5 lbs 13 oz. Now I'm 35 weeks but at 31 weeks I had an ultrasound (level 2) and they said she was about 4lbs already. I'm nervous about her size as well!!
Its scary i also.have gestational diabetes so shes a big one

My first was a girl she was 9 lb 7 oz and I was 21 yrs old that was in 07 now I'm 29 and 22 weeks along and my fiance said he was a 13 lb baby and I had a stillborn it'll be a year dec 27 and she was 14 inches long and I was only 26 weeks but had I carried her full term I'm sure she would have been a big baby and now this one is a boy and feels like he's sucking the life out of me I harldy have any energy at all and headaches all the time I can't wait for him to come out just scared how big he's going to be bc how big I am already .....good luck to all soon to be mamas out there ...
The midwife told me the baby has till 35 weeks to turn. After that the baby can't move. I'm 32 weeks now and my little man is 5lbs
I am 32 wks monday, they said my boy was 3lb14oz.. so i am also worried but i have gd and a few other issues too so idk we will see. Good luck. Im sure she will turn around.
Hopefully she does turn im scared thanks alot

question: So i had a ultrasound on wednesday and bby weights 6lbs and is in breech position worried she wont turn im 33weeks
title: worried big bby
